c:attribute.name: brandCount
c:attribute.description: Number of brand names in catalog

c:attribute.name: productCount
c:attribute.description: Number of products in this catalog

c:attribute.name: publisher
c:attribute.description: Deprecated - publisher is used or updated

c:attribute.name: version
c:attribute.description: Deprecated - Version is now pulled from the filename

c:method.name: GetProductCatalog
c:method.description: Returns information about the product catalog for the context population.

c:method.name: GetCategories
c:method.description: Returns a list of all the categories as a structure (name, image) referenced in this catalog as well as counts by category. Nested catagories will be returned as fully qualified forward-slash delimited paths

c:return.name: counts
c:return.description: The counts of products by category name

c:method.name: GetBrands
c:method.description: Returns a list of all the brands referenced in this catalog where each is a structure containing (name, image, description). In addition the counts of products by brand name are returned.

c:return.name: counts
c:return.description: The counts of products by brand name

c:method.name: GetAllProducts
c:method.description: Gets all products including those that are not browseable.
